articles.title: DPRK to Take Every Necessary Measure to Protect Its Sovereignty
articles.content:
DPRK to Take Every Necessary Measure to Protect Its Sovereignty
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on Mar. 11 as regards the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppets:
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppets started large-scale war exercises targeted against the DPRK on Mar. 9 at last.
					
					These war exercises were kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet war-like forces across south Korea at a time when the inter-Korean relations have reached the worst phase and the situation has grown so tense that a war may break out any moment due to the reckless policy of confrontation pursued by the south Korean conservative authorities. The war maneuvers are nuclear war exercises designed to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK in terms of their scale and contents from A to Z.
					
					Involved in the exercises are far greater number of U.S. troops present overseas and more offensive military equipment including two nuclear-powdered carriers and nuclear submarines than those mobilized in the previous war maneuvers. Their duration is double that of the saber rattling staged before.
					
					No one can vouch that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces will not play with fire against the DPRK while staging such dangerous war exercises.
					
					The new administration of the U.S. is now working hard to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK by force of arms in collusion with the south Korean puppet bellicose forces after letting loose a whole string of words and deeds little short of getting on the nerves of the DPRK and seriously interfering in its internal affairs.
					
					This situation hardens the will of the DPRK to bolster up its defence capability in every way no matter what others may say.
					
					The DPRK, exposed to the potential threat of the U.S. and its allied forces, will take every necessary measure to protect its sovereignty.

articles.title: KCNA Brands U.S. as World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
KCNA Brands U.S. as World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The United States is not entitled to talk about human rights as it is the world's worst human rights abuser.
					In the U.S. the absolute majority of working people are like more dead than alive with their elementary rights to clothing, food and housing deprived.
					
					The same can be said of the right concerning personal inviolability.
					
					The right to labor, one of major rights related to existence, is ruthlessly violated there.
					
					The right to job, the right to get a fair reward for the labor done, the right to safe and hygienic working conditions and rational working hours, and the like are nothing but empty talk.
					
					Those in authority in the U.S. are talking about "freedom", "equality" and "democracy" but in fact, the political and socio-cultural rights of the overwhelming majority of working masses are institutionally violated and stamped out.
					
					As for election, it strictly serves the rich only.
					
					Outwardly, the U.S. professes "freedom" of speech, demonstration and assembly but the reality is quite contrary.
					
					Even the trade unions are denied their rights.
					
					The corruption of cultural life is institutionally fostered, thus leaving a great number of people degenerated and hopeless and pushing them to committing crimes.
					
					The U.S. tops the world list of violators abusing human rights by all sorts of discrimination.
					
					Racial discrimination is getting more serious with each passing day there.
					
					The U.S. also ranks first in violating children's rights.
					
					The U.S. administration has not yet endorsed the "Convention on the Rights of the Child" nor admitted such rights as growth and education of children and ban on child labor.
					
					The same holds true for infringement upon women's rights.
					
					The U.S. violates rights of other countries as it pleases. After the "September 11 incident" it escalated wars of aggression against several countries under the pretext of "war on terrorism" while savagely infringing upon human rights in different parts of the world.
					
					The U.S. also harshly tramples down freedom of religion and religious belief.
					
					Terrorist outrages sponsored by the U.S. against state leaders and democratic figures of various countries are a vivid expression of human rights abuses.
					
					The number of assassination and terrorist operations conducted by the U.S. against prominent statesmen and VIPs of governments in various countries reached as many as more than 900 in the period from 1961 to 1976.
					
					All the facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is, indeed, a kingpin of human rights abuses.
					
					The U.S. had better address its own human rights issue before conducting human rights campaign on the international arena.

articles.title: Greetings to PM of Mauritius
articles.content:
Greetings to PM of Mauritius
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Kim Yong Il sent a message of greetings to Prime Minister of Mauritius Navinchandra Ramgoolam on Mar. 9 on the occasions of the 41st anniversary of its independence and the 17th anniversary of the proclamation of the Republic of Mauritius.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests, the message wished him bigger success in his work for the economic development of the country.

articles.title: Buddhist Masses for Country's Reunification Held
articles.content:
Buddhist Masses for Country's Reunification Held
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Buddhist masses for Korea's reunification were held at different temples across the country on Wednesday to mark Day of Buddha's Nirvana, 2553 B.E.
					Attending the masses were office bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and its provincial, city and county committees, chief priests and monks of temples and believers.
					
					A ritual for the said occasion took place and speeches were made at the masses.
					
					Speakers noted that the Nirvana day is commemorated at the emotion-charged time when all the people have turned out to effect a great surge of leap forward on all fronts for building a great prosperous and powerful nation in hearty response to the call of the joint editorial for this year. And they stressed the need for the Buddhists to join in different practical activities and thus make a tangible contribution to building a thriving nation.
					
					They recalled that the inter-Korean relations, which had favorably developed along with the June 15 era of reunification, have reached the worst phase due to the Lee Myung Bak group's sycophancy towards the U.S. and its moves for confrontation and war with the DPRK.
					
					They called upon all the Buddhists at home and abroad to unite in Dharma-minded concord and turn out in the action to entomb the Lee group, defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, apply the idea of "By our nation itself" and realize the national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: New Bean Sour Milk Manufacturing Technology Developed
articles.content:
New Bean Sour Milk Manufacturing Technology Developed
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A new processing technology of bean milk developed by the Foodstuff Institute under the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science of the DPRK is attracting the attention of experts and technicians.
					The research team of the institute found a method to manufacture the bean milk as the bean sour milk on the basis of a unique principle differing from the old methods whose process was complex and production cost was high.
					
					The method is a completely new one which directly inoculates and ferments lactobacilli in the high temperature in which miscellaneous bacteria can not grow.
					
					This bean sour milk not only has fresh taste and flavor but also helps digestion. And its nutritive value nearly doubles that of the bean milk.
					
					In particular, as useful elements including various vitamins come into being during the ferment, bean sour milk has a nutritive value equivalent to the cow milk without adding expensive vitamins.
					
					The technology enables local foodstuff factories without the pressure sterilizer and cold-storage facilities to produce bean sour milk. It is appreciated by many units which have introduced the technology to production.

articles.title: Historic Wangjaesan Meeting
articles.content:
Historic Wangjaesan Meeting
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung advanced into Onsong of Korea, leading the anti-Japanese guerrilla army 76 years ago for the purpose of spreading and developing the armed struggle into the homeland and rapidly bringing about a surge of the general Korean revolution with the anti-Japanese armed struggle as the axis.
					The President held a meeting of chiefs of underground revolutionary organizations and political workers in the Onsong area at Mt. Wangjae, Onsong County, on March 11, Juche 22 (1933) and delivered a historic speech "To spread and develop the armed struggle into the homeland".
					
					He said in the speech that it is necessary to wage a more forceful struggle to establish and consolidate more semi-guerrilla zones over a wide area in the homeland adjacent to the guerrilla bases along the Tuman River in order to expand and develop the armed struggle into the homeland.
					
					Along with this, he put forward tasks to firmly rally the whole nation as a single political force and to wage Party founding preparation work.
					
					He said that all those who hate the Japanese imperialists and truly want the country's liberation should be rallied as one under the banner of the anti-Japanese national united front, irrespective of property status, education, residence or sex, adding that legal and illegal revolutionary organizations of various forms should be formed to rally masses of broad sections around the organizations and educate them in a revolutionary way.
					
					After the meeting, he went to various places of the homeland and sat together with chiefs of revolutionary organizations and political workers to take concrete measures for implementing the policy of the Wangjaesan Meeting thoroughly.
					
					Besides, he dispatched political workers to different parts of the homeland and let them expand revolutionary organizations and firmly rally the broad anti-Japanese patriotic forces under the banner of the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					The Wangjaesan Meeting held under the guidance of the President was a historic meeting to spread and develop the armed struggle into the homeland and advance vigorously the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle along the orbit of Juche.

articles.title: U.S. Scheme for Supremacy Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Scheme for Supremacy Flayed
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Quoting Reuters as saying that the United States is these days stepping up the performance test of the anti-missile system in real earnest while underlining the "need" to build the missile defence system, Rodong Sinmun today in a signed commentary denounces such scheme as an act of openly challenging by force of arms the unanimous desire of humankind to live in a peaceful and stable world, free from arms race.
					It is the criminal intention and strategy of the U.S. imperialists to keep their supremacy and put the world under their control by force, the commentary points out, and says:
					
					The U.S. imperialists have regarded the establishment of MD system as important part of implementing the military strategy for supremacy in the new century.
					
					With this wild ambition, the U.S. unilaterally abrogated the ABM treaty, which served as a cornerstone of strategic stability and a basis for reducing strategic offensive weapons in the past, during the Bush administration. And it has been persistently working to establish the MD system at any cost under the pretext of "protection" and "security," pouring an exorbitant amount of funds in this scheme.
					
					It is as clear as noonday that if the U.S. establishment of MD system is stepped up, this would cause complicated situation, seriously threaten and wreck peace and increase the danger of a war.
					
					Under this situation, not only those countries without any nuke and missile but also those countries with comparably less nuclear weapons and missiles are compelled to take military measures against the U.S. nuclear and missile threat. In actuality, various countries are putting spurs to increasing the military capability. Besides, big powers do not remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. scheme for establishing MD system but are taking corresponding measures. That is why it is needless to say that the U.S. moves for securing the military edge will trigger off a new arms race and a cold war.
					
					In history there were many forces that ran amuck in conquering the world. But, none of them could realize their ambition to conquer the world.
					
					Today when independence has become the trend of the times and the progressive forces' strength is growing unprecedentedly, it is quite impossible for the U.S. to realize its ambition to dominate the world.
					
					The U.S. would be advised to assess the reality cool-headedly and lucidly and drop its hegemonic policy against the history and peace.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Military Provocation Rebuked
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Military Provocation Rebuked
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak and his stooges of south Korea slandered the DPRK's recent measure for self-defense as "provocation" and "action which may cause an armed conflict." Meanwhile they are making a great fuss about it, calling an emergency meeting and giving an alert order.
					Rodong Sinmun today carries a signed commentary in this regard. It cites data to disclose the fact that the Lee Myung Bak bellicose group has long got hell-bent on escalating war exercises while regarding them as the main lever to threaten the DPRK militarily and realize its design for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					The group's military provocative moves against the DPRK may lead to an all-out war any time, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are now replete with the do-or-die spirit to wipe out the garbage of history for good by fully displaying the might of the arms bolstered with Songun.
					
					The dangerous military provocation by the Lee group will only accelerate its final doom.
					
					The treacherous clique must not run amuck, pondering over the grave consequences to be entailed by its reckless actions.

articles.title: Confrontational Outbursts of Minister of "Unification" of S. Korea Rebuked
articles.content:
Confrontational Outbursts of Minister of "Unification" of S. Korea Rebuked
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, who became minister of "Unification" of south Korea, at a recent "commemorating event" let loose such balderdashes as the "development of the south-north relations based on co-existence and co-prosperity" and "dialogue." He also talked rubbish that he "respects the agreements between the south and the north" and is concerned for the "existence of the nation" and its "peace" and "co-prosperity."
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					This is an evident expression of the attempt for confrontation against reunification as well as a crafty ploy to conceal the treacherous and bellicose true colors and mislead the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					Owing to the anti-DPRK confrontational moves of the Lee Myung Bak group the agreements reached between the north and the south in the past for defusing the political and military confrontation on the Korean Peninsula were already reduced to dead documents and the peace of the country is seriously threatened.
					
					Even at this moment the puppet warmongers are frantically conducting the large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises simulating the invasion of the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, posing a grave military threat to it.
					
					They, however, vociferated about "respect for the agreements," "existence of the nation" and "co-prosperity," while shelving their own crimes. This is an imprudent act of reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					The group of traitors including Hyon In Thaek is making all sorts of rhetoric to justify its treacherous policy of "co-existence" and "co-prosperity" and camouflage its true colors as a disturber of north-south relations and an anti-DPRK war maniac. But the nature of the wolf can not change though it puts on sheep's skin.
					
					The group of traitors should not waste away time in a futile work but step down at once as unanimously demanded by the whole nation, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Behaviors of Judicial Authorities Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Behaviors of Judicial Authorities Blasted in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A justice of the puppet Supreme Court of south Korea forced judges to give a verdict of guilt to those who have been detained because of their participation in the candlelight actions in a trial of them and urged the judges to continue the trial till a decision of the constitutional court on the candle-light demonstration is made and draw a conclusion according to the laws now in force.
					The chief justice of the Supreme Court was also involved in such reckless conduct.
					
					The Bar Association for Democratic Society in south Korea said in its statement on Mar. 5 that such behavior of the justice was an act of betraying a justice's conscience and violating the laws. This case goes to clearly prove that the judicial authorities have been reduced to a waiting maid of the power, it pointed out.
					
					The Citizens Federation for Economic Justice, too, made public a statement saying it was fully revealed through the recent case that the judicial authorities are cooking up the results of trials to meet the demand of the power. The statement warned that the Supreme Court would face a strong resistance of the people if it covers up the truth of the case and hushes it up.
					
					The Solidarity for Progress in its statement expressed indignation and astonishment at the judicial authorities' flattery to the power and demanded that the truth behind the case be clarified.

articles.title: Policy of Gender Discrimination Slashed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Policy of Gender Discrimination Slashed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- More than 2,000 members of women organizations in south Korea, including the Federation of Women Organizations, held a rally in Seoul on Mar. 8 in protest against traitor Lee Myung Bak's discrimination policy.
					Speakers at the rally charged that the gender discrimination is getting more pronounced in all realms of society due to the Lee "government's" biased discrimination policy.
					
					If Lee is allowed to pursue such policy women would be driven to the edge of precipice in their living, they deplored.
					
					They stressed that all the women in this land will come out in the struggle against the "government" pursuing only the self-righteous and power-centered policy.

articles.title: Struggle for Probing Truth about Slain Evacuees Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Probing Truth about Slain Evacuees Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Members of different organizations of south Korea, including the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Social Progress, the Seoul District Federation of University Students and the University Students Solidarity for Culture, and Internet users held a rally in Seoul on Mar. 7 to declare a solidarity struggle for probing the truth behind the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan.
					Speakers at the rally recalled that recently the security authorities issued summons, arrest warrants and others against the members of the All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan one after another.
					
					This is a manifestation of the "government's" trick to cover up its crime of killing the evacuees and contain the committee's activities, they charged, stressing: The committee will not stop its actions no matter how harsh the authorities' suppression is.
					
					They declared that the people from all walks of life would fight in unity to probe the truth behind the tragic death of evacuees and demand the release of the detainees and the punishment of the chief murderer.

articles.title: Protests against War Exercises Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protests against War Exercises Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Struggle against the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers was launched in different parts of south Korea on Mar. 9.
					The South Kyongsang Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the Preparatory Committee for the South Kyongsang Provincial Solidarity for Progress held a news conference outside the Provincial Office.
					
					Speakers at the conference denounced the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' joint military exercises as a saber rattling for preemptive attack designed to topple the north.
					
					They said that the exercises are utterly contrary to the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration which called for dialogue and cooperation and normalization of relations and the agreement of the six-party talks.
					
					They urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the war maneuvers escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The Ulsan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the Preparatory Committee for the Ulsan Solidarity for Progress, too, called a press conference at which they charged that the large-scale joint military exercises are as good as an act of pouring oil in the fire as they were launched at a time when the inter-Korean relations have been put on the worst crisis, even bringing about the danger of military clashes.
					
					A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party said at the "National Assembly": The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak "government" are talking about "dialogue" with the DPRK while staging the DPRK-targeted war exercises in violation of the UN Charter and the Armistice Agreement. This is no more than hypocrisy of a wolf in sheep's skin.

articles.title: Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Issued
articles.content:
Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Issued
Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the February issue of its magazine "Paektu-Halla."
					Carried in the magazine is a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il standing on Mt. Paektu.
					
					It also carries the congratulatory letter the general association sent to the leader on the occasion of February 16, his birthday.
					
					The magazine gives a special write-up under the title "Greatest honor of Kim Il Sung's nation being led by the illustrious commander."
					
					It conveys photo-accompanied news that the general association and its affiliated organizations inaugurated preparatory committees and held colorful events to celebrate February 16.
					
					It carries the full text of "Our revolutionary armed forces will mercilessly smash the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' moves for confrontation with the DPRK," a statement issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
					
					It also deals with news about the homeland and activities of branches of the association, etc.

articles.title: RPDC tomara todas las medidas necesarias para defender soberania
articles.content:
RPDC tomara todas las medidas necesarias para defender soberania
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con que Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos iniciaron los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 11 como sigue:
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos comenzaron por fin el 9 de marzo los ejercicios de guerra de gran envergadura contra nuestro pais.
					
					Estos ejercicios, que desarrollan EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres del Sur de Corea a lo largo del suelo surcoreano justamente cuando las relaciones intercoreanas cayeron en la peor situacion a punto del estallido de guerra debido a la imprudente politica de enfrentamiento de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas, es de punta a cabo, tanto en su dimension como en su contenido, el entrenamiento de guerra nuclear para atacar preventivamente a la RPDC.
					
					En la presente maniobra conjunta se movilizan mucho mas tropas norteamericanas provenientes del extranjero en comparacion con el pasado y los equipos militares de ataque como 2 portaaviones y submarinos nucleares.  Ademas, su periodo es el doble que el de antes.
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos no convertiran este simulacro en la guerra real contra la RPDC.
					
					La nueva administracion de EE.UU. ya habia pronunciado uno tras otro los discursos provocativos y muy intervencionistas en los asuntos internos de la RPDC e intenta ahora violar la soberania de ella con las fuerzas armadas en contubernio con los belicistas titeres surcoreanos. Bajo estas circunstancias, estamos redoblando la voluntad de fortalecer por todos los medios nuestras fuerzas de defensa nacional sin hacer caso de lo que digan otros.
					
					Tomaremos todas las medidas necesarias para defender la soberania del pais bajo la amenaza real que nos ejercen EE.UU. y sus seguidores.

articles.title: ATCC comenta que EE.UU. es peor violador de DDHH
articles.content:
ATCC comenta que EE.UU. es peor violador de DDHH
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos es el peor violador de DDHH en el mundo que no tiene ningun derecho para abordar este asunto.
					En EE.UU. la abrumadora mayoria de las masas trabajadoras son moribundas privadas de los elementales derechos del ser humano a vestirse, alimentarse, alojarse y a vivir.
					
					La situacion de la inviolabilidad personal no puede ser mas calamitosa.
					
					Sobre todo, es violado flagrantemente el derecho a trabajar, uno de los principales derechos para la vida.
					
					En ese pais son palabras nada mas los derechos a tener un empleo, ser remunerado justamente por el trabajo realizado y a trabajar en condiciones seguras e higienicas durante el tiempo laboral fijado racionalmente, etc.
					
					Aunque las autoridades norteamericanas hablan tanto de la "libertad", "igualdad" y "democracia", en realidad son violados y suprimidos institucionalmente los derechos politicos y socioculturales de la abrumadora mayoria de las masas populares trabajadoras.
					
					Las elecciones sirven exclusivamente para los adinerados.
					
					Es pomposamente anunciado que en EE.UU. hay la "libertad" de la prensa, la manifestacion y el mitin, pero la realidad indica todo lo contrario.
					
					Son restringidos los derechos de los sindicatos.
					
					Se fomenta institucionalmente el empobrecimiento de la vida cultural que empuja a numerosas personas a la degeneracion, desesperacion y la delincuencia.
					
					EE.UU. es el campeon mundial tambien en la violacion de DDHH a traves de la discriminacion de todo tipo, en particular, la racial.
					
					El imperio es uno de los connotados violadores del mundo de los derechos de la infancia.
					
					La administracion norteamericana no ha firmado todavia la "Convencion sobre los derechos infantiles" ni reconoce los derechos de los ninos como el crecimiento, la educacion y la prohibicion de trabajo infantil.
					
					Sucede lo mismo en cuanto a los derechos de la mujer.
					
					Por otra parte, EE.UU. viola brutalmente los DDHH en todas partes del mundo mientras que amplia escalonadamente despues de los "sucesos del 11 de septiembre" las guerras de agresion contra otros paises bajo el pretexto de "antiterrorismo".
					
					Ademas, pisotea sin piedad la libertad de religion y creencia.
					
					Otra forma de violacion de DDHH es el terrorismo que fomenta EE.UU. contra los estadistas y personalidades democraticas de varios paises.
					
					En el periodo 1961-1976, se reportaron mas de 900 casos del asesinato selectivo contra las renombradas figuras politicas y del gobierno de varios paises del mundo.
					
					Los hechos vuelven a corroborar que ese imperio es el peor violador y exterminador de DDHH.
					
					EE.UU. debera resolver este problema de su propia casa antes de acusar a otros en los escenarios internacionales.

articles.title: Oficios budistas para la reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
Oficios budistas para la reunificacion de patria
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 11 en los templos a lo largo de Corea los actos budistas para la reunificacion de la patria en ocasion del Dia de Nirvana de Buda en el ano 2553 de la Era Budista con la participacion de los clerigos del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea y de los comites provinciales, urbanos y distritales de esta entidad, los monjes-jefes, los monjes y los creyentes de los respectivos templos.
					En las ocasiones se efectuaron las ceremonias y hubo discursos.
					
					Conmemoramos el Dia de Nirvana de Buda en los tiempos agitados en que todo el pueblo del pais da pasos agigantados del gran auge en todos los dominios de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera en correspondencia al llamamiento del editorial conjunto de este ano, comenzaron los oradores.
					
					Encomendaron a los budistas que hagan especial aporte a la construccion de una gran potencia prospera a traves de varias actividades practicas.
					
					Subrayaron que las relaciones Norte-Sur, que vinieron desarrollandose favorablemente en la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio, llegaron a la peor coyuntura debido al servilismo a EE.UU. de la banda de Lee Myung Bak y sus maniobras para el enfrentamiento y la guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Llamaron a todos los budistas del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar a unir sus devociones budistas para levantarse activamente en la lucha practica por enterrar a la banda de Lee Myung Bak, defender y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, materializar el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y lograr la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia la politica hegemonica de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia la politica hegemonica de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- Segun Reuters, en estos dias, Estados Unidos realiza en etapa crucial la prueba del funcionamiento del sistema antimisiles hablando tanto de la "necesidad" de establecer la red de defensa antimisil.
					Esta conducta es igual a desafiar abiertamente con fusiles al unanime deseo de la humanidad de vivir libremente en un mundo pacifico y estable donde no haya la carrera armamentista.
					
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual publicado hoy y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. tiene el intento criminal y la estrategia de mantener su posicion hegemonica y controlar arbitrariamente el mundo basandose en la fuerza.
					
					El imperio toma el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles como lo clave del cumplimiento de su hegemonica estrategia militar del nuevo siglo.
					
					A partir de esta ambicion, la administracion Bush anulo unilateralmente el tratado ABM que en el pasado servia de base para la estabilidad estrategica y la reduccion de armas estrategicas de ataque. 
					
					Actualmente, bajo el pretexto de la supuesta "proteccion" y "seguridad", EE.UU. actua obstinadamente para implantar a toda costa el sistema antimisiles invirtiendo fabulosos fondos.
					
					Es evidente que a medida que se acelere el establecimiento del citado sistema, se crearan las circunstancias complicadas, se vera amenazada y perturbada seriamente la paz y crecera el peligro de guerra.
					
					Esta situacion obligara a los paises desprovistos de armas nucleares y misiles y a los portadores de una cantidad relativamente menor de estos artefactos a tomar las medidas militares frente a la amenaza de EE.UU. con los mismos.
					
					Realmente, varios paises del mundo se esfuerzan mucho por fortalecer sus fuerzas armadas.
					
					En particular, las otras potencias estan tomando las contramedidas frente al sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. sin quedarse con brazos cruzados.
					
					Por lo tanto, es obvio que las maniobras de EE.UU. en pro de la heguemonia militar traeran la nueva carrera armamentista y la nueva guerra fria.
					
					Aunque historicamente hubo muchas fuerzas que intentaron conquistar el mundo, ninguna pudo realizar su ambicion.
					
					Hoy en dia, cuando la verificacion de la independencia es la tendencia de la epoca y se fortalece mas que nunca el campo progresista, resulta cada vez mas irrealizable la ambicion del imperio de senorear el mundo.
					
					EE.UU. debe ver con serenidad la realidad y abandonar su politica hegemonica de caracter antihistorico y antipaz.
